backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature evidence metadata for favicon requirements and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short functional descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides with global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with favicon links, page metadata, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the marketing site layout, navigation, sections, and smooth scrolling interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor using Internet Identity and react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hooks implementing Internet Identity auth flow with AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles defining warm earthy OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global smoothing and spacing rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point mounting the React app with InternetIdentityProvider and react‑query client.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, components, and utilities using OKLCH CSS variables.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, required images, known favicon issues, and a list of existing website features. Provides architectural notes and flags the state as a fix request.
